mapper.insert: insert into partner (ID, TENANT_ID, `TYPE`, `NAME`, API_ENDPOINT, ACCESS_KEY, SECRET_KEY, ENABLED, LONG_TICKET, TICKET_DATE_THRU, REFRESH_TOKEN, `COMMENT`, DATE_FROM, DATE_THRU, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{apiEndpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{longTicket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketDateThru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refreshToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateThru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update partner set TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, `TYPE` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, API_ENDPOINT = #{apiEndpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESS_KEY = #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRET_KEY = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, LONG_TICKET = #{longTicket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TICKET_DATE_THRU = #{ticketDateThru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REFRESH_TOKEN = #{refreshToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `COMMENT` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_FROM = #{dateFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATE_THRU = #{dateThru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, TENANT_ID, `TYPE`, `NAME`, API_ENDPOINT, ACCESS_KEY, SECRET_KEY, ENABLED, LONG_TICKET, TICKET_DATE_THRU, REFRESH_TOKEN, `COMMENT`, DATE_FROM, DATE_THRU, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from partner where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
